snippet.title: Paper Planes Announcement Trailer (Long)
snippet.description:
Wish list Paper Planes @ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2301500/Paper_Planes/

Join Paper Planes Discord server @  https://discord.gg/MZy7brk39a

Welcome to the exhilarating world of Paper Planes, Prepare to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey where strategy, skill, and precision are the keys to victory. In this fast-paced PvP game, you'll engage in epic dogfights, outmaneuver rivals, and strategically dismantle their bases to claim dominance in the skies.
                                                                           
  Paper Planes pits players against each other in intense aerial combat, where the primary objective is to eliminate opposing players' bases while defending your own. You'll navigate through diverse landscapes, ranging from lush forests to treacherous canyons, each offering unique challenges and tactical opportunities.

  Choose from an array of meticulously designed toy planes, each with its own customizable features. Upgrade your planes with powerful weapons and specialized abilities to gain a competitive edge in battle.
 
  Experience dynamic aerial combat with responsive controls and physics-based gameplay. Master the art of aerial maneuvers, including barrel rolls, loop-the-loops, and evasive maneuvers, to outmaneuver opponents and evade incoming fire.

  Form alliances and coordinate with teammates to launch coordinated assaults on enemy bases or defend against incoming threats. Communication and teamwork are crucial for achieving victory in intense 2V2, 4v4, 6V6 and free-for-all battles.
 
  Earn experience points and unlock new planes, weapons, and upgrades as you progress through the ranks. Compete in ranked matches to climb the leaderboard and earn exclusive rewards, including rare customization options and in-game currency.

  Immerse yourself in stunning, handcrafted environments. From bustling metropolises to city parks to psychadelic mushroom worlds, every location is brimming with detail and personality.
